notes.title: Ethics approval and consent to participate
notes.p: Study activities were reviewed by the institutional review board of Saint George Hospital (Number: 009, Date: 2016) and Makassed General Hospital (Name: Mira El Chaar, Date: 2016).

A written informed consent was obtained from all eligible women before entering the study. Women were informed about the study, their participation was voluntary and they had the right to withdraw at any moment. The risks and benefits were clearly explained.
